source
methodology
data frequency

CAFOs Concentrated animal feeding operation

Defined by the United States Department of Agriculture (USDA), is an intensive animal feeding operation (AFO) in which over 1000 animal units are confined for over 45 days a year.

We begin with exact locations for refineries across all countries that have refining facilities. Thermal sensors are used to detect the outflow of energy from the facility and measure the emissions from combustion using a well known modeling process.

Updated every 3 weeks

highlights

Power sector emissions declines by 1.2%.

Change in energy related CO2 emissions by region - 2018-2019

Global power sector emissions declined by some 170 Mt, or 1.2%, with the biggest falls taking place in advanced economies where CO2 emissions are now at levels not seen since the late 1980s (when electricity demand was one-third lower).

Global CO2 emissions from coal use declined from 2018.
